about_the_game:
DUMB LITTLE CREATURES - FREE DEMO
Help a group of innocent creatures avoid all deadly hazards and get back home safely.

Explore all this bright and fun world, giving instructions to these small creatures to build, dig and perform many activities that will allow them to survive dangerous elements such as guillotines and saws.

DUMB LITTLE CREATURES is a fun and challenging puzzle, in which you have to give directions to a group of innocent creatures to avoid hazards and get them to the exit of each level.

GET THE FULL VERSION HERE:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Dumb Little Creatures Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 GS, ATI Radeon HD 3470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 (32/64), Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 GS, ATI Radeon HD 3470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
